ygData.subject: Re: Re: Medium Bronze Armor - SPOILER
ygData.msgSnippet: ... You can buy bronze from High Hold NPCs? ... Has anyone else noticed that normal steel weapons sell for more to vendors than fine steel weapons?  I looted
ygData.messageBody:
On Mon, 19 Jul 1999, Roop Dirump wrote:
>
> I went to the saturday night bazaar and was shocked at the prices people
> were paying for bronze! I had actually outfitted a good amount of my own
> bronze from High Hold NPCs, and paid less than the poor schmos at the

You can buy bronze from High Hold NPCs?

> bazaar! Best check the NPCs around the area, you just may pay less than
> from PCs. (The NPCs perhaps truely understand the value of bonze, it's
> junk...)

Has anyone else noticed that normal steel weapons sell for
more to vendors than fine steel weapons? I looted "a
longsword" off a dragoon guard in Nektulos that some L49
warrior killed and left after he looted the coin (guess the
sword wasn't worth the weight to him?). Fine steel longswords
sell for a bit over 6pp. This normal longsword sold for 11pp.
I guess Verant nerfed the fine steel weapon selling prices at
some point.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
